title: Farberware Fresh Apple Wedger, Red
features: Cores and evenly slices fruit with one maneuver
Stainless steel blades glide easily through fruit and tough skins
Handles absorb pressure putting less tension on hands
description: This Farberware Fresh Red Apple Wedge easily and efficiently cores apples and pears for everyday consumption or for use in pies and desserts. The stainless steel blades glide easily through fruit and tough skins, and the plastic handles absorb pressure, putting less tension on hands. Easy to clean, dishwasher safe.
